sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you combine <radical>fire</radical> with <radical>violence</radical>, it will <kanji>explode</kanji>! A fire, once full of violence, will surely explode. The fire can’t handle all that violence so the fire just rumbles and shakes and then finally explodes. BOOM!
meaningInfo: Imagine the fire explode. Feel the heat of the fire and the explosion. It’s very violent. BOOM BOOM BA-BOOM!
readingMnemonic: As you watch the fire <kanji>explode</kanji>, you start to <reading>back</reading> (<ja>ばく</ja>) away. I don’t blame you. You need to back away or else you’ll get caught in the violent explosion. Back away a little more just to be safe.
readingInfo: Imagine yourself as you back away from the explosion. As you back away, see the fire dance and feel the heat of the explosion on your face.
